column_description: The unique identifier of the payment method.
Timestamp of when a record was last synced.
Boolean identifiying whether the record was deleted in the source.
The unique identifier of the account associated with this payment method.
The account type for ACH payment methods.
A Boolean value indicating whether this payment method is active.
The account type for bank transfer payment methods.
The unique identifier of the user who created this payment method.
The date and time when this payment method was created.
The credit card type for credit card payment methods.
The date and time when the last sale transaction failed for this payment method.
The date and time of the last transaction for this payment method.
The status of the last transaction for this payment method.
The maximum number of consecutive payment failures allowed for this payment method.
The name of the payment method.
The number of consecutive payment failures for this payment method.
The status of the payment method.
The PayPal account type for PayPal payment methods.
The sub-type of the payment method.
The total number of error payments for this payment method.
The total number of processed payments for this payment method.
The type of the payment method.
The unique identifier of the user who last updated this payment method.
The date and time when this payment method was last updated.
